docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT AND JURY DEMAND filed by All Plaintiffs against All Defendants with Jury Demand. Plaintiff requests summons issued. Receipt No: 0645-4642301 - Fee: $ 400. County of 1st Plaintiff: St. Clair County - County Where Action Arose: St. Clair County - County of 1st Defendant: St. Clair County. [Previously dismissed case: No] [Possible companion case(s): None] (Carlson, Kevin)

A United States Magistrate Judge of this Court is available to conduct all proceedings in this civil action in accordance with 28 U.S.C. 636c and FRCP 73. The Notice, Consent, and Reference of a Civil Action to a Magistrate Judge form is available for download at http://www.mied.uscourts.gov (KKra)
